text: Valley County is a county found in the U.S. state of Montana. As of the 2020 United States Census, there were 7,578 people. Its county seat is Glasgow. It is on the Canadaâ€“United States border with Saskatchewan. The county was created in 1893 from part of Dawson County. == References == Category:1893 establishments in Montana Category:Montana counties
title: Valley County, Montana
